posts.post_content:
I am offering a 10% discount off of any purchase of $50.00 or more from my web site between now and the end of the year.  Use the code NET54-10% at checkout to receive the discount.  This is a multi use code that is good through December 23.

This includes any of the more than 19,000 listings that I currently have up and I will still be adding more.  I have singles from 1952 through 1970 as well as my graded cards from T and E cards to Goudey and Topps.

My web site is [url]http://www.oldvintagebaseballcards.com[/url]  

Thank you 
Marty Pritchard
